name: Blue Ridge Textile Co., Inc., Appellant, v. Travelers Indemnity Company
name_abbreviation: Blue Ridge Textile Co. v. Travelers Indemnity Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on opinion of President Judge William G. Barthold, 27 Pa. D. & C. 2d 55.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Blue Ridge Textile Co., Inc., Appellant, v. Travelers Indemnity Company.
Argued April 26, 1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
May 21, 1962:
William, E. Young, with him Edmund P. Turtzo, for appellant.
James B. MeQiffert, with him Faclcenthal, Teel cG McG-iffert, for appellee.
